title: I will be in class 12 next year. Am I eligible for the NDA 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: Please understand the above image in your second year December you can apply for NDA. In the meanwhile purchase a NDA WRITTEN Examination guide and start solving all sections. Chalk out a plan and stick to it. please practice physical fitness activities mentioned in the following image.  Improve your personality on the pin pointed aspects.  Wishing you all the best.
Yes you will be Eligible if you have Passed OR you are in Class 12th and your Age Should be Between 16.5 and 19.5 Years Best of Luck bro!
